AlarmLogic.name: 区段占用-防护信号机UD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
SLT_KGL: FC = 区间闭塞_发车方向__1_区间方向_1_发车_TCC_, 区间闭塞_发车方向__1_区间方向_1_FD_L_CBI_, 区间闭塞_发车方向__1_区间方向_1_FD_L_CTC_

HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: FC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线发车-区段占用报警-2LD

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 发车进路_10_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_2LD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_2LD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线发车-区段占用报警-2UD

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 发车进路_10_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1

AlarmLogic.name: 正线发车-区段占用报警-LD

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 发车进路_10_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LD_CTC_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线发车-区段占用报警-LUD

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 发车进路_10_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LUD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LUD_CTC_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LUD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线发车-区段占用报警-UD

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 发车进路_10_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_UD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_UD_CTC_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_UD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线发车-区段占用报警-USUD

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 发车进路_10_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_USUD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_USUD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线发车-区段占用HD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 发车进路_10_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CTC_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW
RESUME: 1 == 1

IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-USUD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_USUD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_USUD_CTC_
HAS: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-LUD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LUD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LUD_CTC_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_LUD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-HBD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HBD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HBD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-HD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CTC_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW
RESUME: 1 == 1

AlarmLogic.name: 正线接车-2LD区段占用报警

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 接车进路_9_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_2LD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_2LD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线接车-2UD区段占用报警

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 接车进路_9_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_2UD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_2UD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线接车-LD区段占用报警

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 接车进路_9_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_LD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_LD_CTC_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_LD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线接车-LUD区段占用报警

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 接车进路_9_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_LUD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_LUD_CTC_,接车进路_3_信号机_1_LUD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线接车-UD区段占用报警

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 接车进路_9_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_UD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_UD_CTC_,接车进路_3_信号机_1_UD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线接车-USU区段占用报警

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 3
VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 接车进路_9_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_USUD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_USUD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: OPEN_SECT == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 正线接车-HD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
CHECK: 接车进路_9_是否正线（0_否_1_是）_CONST_1 == 1
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CTC_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
TIME: TIME1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW
RESUME: 1 == 1

AlarmInfo.content: 区段占用与后方区段发码不一致

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-2UD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_2UD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_2UD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-USUD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_USUD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_USUD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-UD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_UD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_UD_CTC_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_UD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-HBD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HBD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HBD_CTC_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: OPEN_SECT_DC == 1
IF: DW == 1
RECORD: DW

AlarmLogic.name: 进路状态不一致-HD

Steps.step: VARTIME: 报警时间 ALARM_TIME = 10
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CSM_
HAS: DW
DELAY_ALL: ALARM_TIME * 5 + 60, ALARM_TIME + 10, ALARM_TIME, 5
IF: DW == 1
RESUME: 1 == 1

AlarmInfo.name: 判断开放状态
AlarmInfo.content: 判断开放状态

AlarmLogic.name: 判断开放状态-信号关闭

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_DC = 1
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 2
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CTC_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CSM_
DELAY_ALL: 180, 2, 1
IF: DW == 1
SET: OPEN_DC = 0
SET: OPEN_SECT = 0
SET: OPEN_SECT_DC = 0

IF: JC == 1
IF: DW == 1

SLT_KGL: FC = 邻站闭塞_1_区间方向_1_发车_TCC_, 邻站闭塞_1_区间方向_1_FD_L_CBI_, 邻站闭塞_1_区间方向_1_FD_L_CTC_

RESUME_IDLE: U == 1
